Actually........

This version kind of sucks - but I'll leave it up and let you guys decide, I'm going back to version 1.2.2 until they fix this version or update it.

dp
Thank you m8, I got this torrent few days ago from exodus.com.co the registrations are still open. This is an elite Mac tracker.

Just to clarify what the uploader meant, this is the Lite version of Sparrow (with no IMAP support etc). So it's just like downloading the official Lite version from the Mac App Store, making this torrent a bit pointless since you can download the official lite version (which is also obviously free) from the Mac App Store or the app's homepage.
